cards.originalText: Creatures you control gain protection from non-Human creatures until end of turn.
cards.flavor:
"As long as we can utter a prayer or lift a weapon, we have the power to fight back."
—Thalia, Knight-Cathar

cards.name: Spectral Flight

Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
cards.originalText:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.
cards.flavor:
"The church looks down on binding spirits into armor, but now I can look down on them."
—Dierk, geistmage

cards.flavor:
"Nobody's seen the Lady of Videns for years. Poor dear, no companions at all in that old castle."
—Yonda of Gavony

cards.name: Thraben Purebloods

"I've learned to trust my dogs' instincts. When they're calm, I'm calm. And when they get nervous, I get my crossbow."
—Hinrik of House Cecani

cards.originalText: Gain control of target creature until end of turn. Untap it. It gains trample and haste until end of turn.

cards.originalText: Target opponent sacrifices a creature. You gain life equal to that creature's toughness.

cards.flavor:
"Who says werewolves are the only ones who can hunt as a pack?"

cards.originalText: Destroy target Spirit or enchantment.
cards.flavor:
"To show geists pity is to prolong their agonies. Whether they know it or not, they seek the Blessed Sleep, and we are to give it to them."
—Mikaeus, the Lunarch

cards.originalText: Vampire creatures you control get +2/+0 and gain first strike until end of turn.

cards.originalText: Flying, first strike
cards.flavor:
"I'd rather take on a neckbiter or moonhowler any day. Oh well, looks like I'm going to end up parrying with empty air half the night."
—Saint Trogen, the Slayer

cards.name: Walking Corpse
cards.flavor:
"Is it hopeless? When wave upon wave of our dead return as mindless flesh-eaters to claw upon Thraben's walls? We're too busy cutting them down to indulge ourselves in such philosophical foppery."
—Mikaeus, the Lunarch
